metadata.title: CVE-2024-47615 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handlingcomponents. An OOB-Write has been detected in the functiongst_parse_vorbis_setup_packet within vorbis_parse.c. The integer size isread from the input file without proper validation. As a result, size canexceed the fixed size of the pad->vorbis_mode_sizes array (which size is256). When this happens, the for loop overwrites the entire pad structurewith 0s and 1s, affecting adjacent memory as well. This OOB-write canoverwrite up to 380 bytes of memory beyond the boundaries of thepad->vorbis_mode_sizes array. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.24.10.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-base1.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
